sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import { BsFillPencilFill, BsFillPlusCircleFill } from "react-icons/bs"; import "./Records.css"; const Records = ({ user, records, setRecords, recordList, setRecordList, currentPage, setCurrentPage, entriesPerPage, totalResults, setEntriesPerPage, getRecords, setTotalResults }) => { return (
< Link to={"/records/edit"} > Add {records.map((record) => { return ( {record.date} Food:{record.food} g Water:{record.water} ml Poop:{record.poop} times Walk:{record.water} mins Vaccine:{record.vaccine} Medicine:{record.medicine} Grooming:{record.grooming} Other:{record.other} {/* Water:{record.water} ml Poop:{record.poop} times Walk:{record.water} mins Vaccine:{record.vaccine} Medicine:{record.medicine} Grooming:{record.grooming} Other:{record.other} */} ) })}
{currentPage!=0&&} Showing page:{currentPage + 1}. {entriesPerPage*(currentPage + 1) { setCurrentPage(currentPage + 1) }} > Get next {entriesPerPage} results }
) } export default Records;
